param.name: counts_matrix
param.label: Matrix of RNA-Seq fragment counts for transcripts per condition

param.name: transcripts_fasta_file
param.label: Transcripts fasta file corresponding to matrix

param.name: dispersion
param.label: dispersion value
param.help: Dispersion value to be used in the negative binomial

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
edgeR is a Bioconductor package focusing on the analysis of digital gene expression data derived from RNA-Seq sequencing technologies.
To learn more about edgeR read their paper_, visit their website_ , or read this user_ guide_ . If you are following the Trinity RNA-seq protocol please go here_ for a galaxy tool walk through or the Nature Protocols publication_ .
